title: Chinese takeaway garlic prawns
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons rapeseed oil', '10 cloves garlic, chopped', '1 teaspoon minced fresh root ginger', '1 small tin water chestnuts, drained and sliced', '100g mange-tout', '100g small white button mushrooms', '1 teaspoon crushed red chilli flakes', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '450g peeled and deveined jumbo shrimp', '125ml chicken stock', '1 tablespoon rice vinegar', '2 tablespoons fish sauce', '2 tablespoons dry sherry', '1 tablespoon cornflour', '1 tablespoon water']
